alert.note: Alert for Kahoolawe; Kipahulu; Lanai Leeward; Lanai Mauka; Lanai South; Lanai Windward; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Central Valley South; Maui Leeward West; Maui Windward West; Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai Southeast; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; South Haleakala; South Maui, Upcountry; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued July 17 at 3:35PM HST until July 19 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR MAUI COUNTY FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY NIGHT... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR HALEAKALA SUMMIT FROM MIDDAY TUESDAY THROUGH TUESDAY NIGHT... .Trade winds will become strong in advance of Tropical Storm Calvin. ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts to around 50 mph. * WHERE...Kahoolawe, Lanai, Maui and Molokai. * WHEN...From 6 AM Tuesday to 6 AM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.
